price: Ṣé kò jẹ́ àmì kan fún wọn pé àwọn onímọ̀ (nínú) àwọn ọmọ ’Isrọ̄’īl nímọ̀ (sí àsọọ́lẹ̀ nípa) rẹ̀ (nínú tírà ọwọ́ wọn)?¹
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: awalam yakun lahum āyatan an yaʿlamahu ʿulamāu banī is'rāīla
